name: UFOCALYPSE
description:
They came from the outer space. UFOs.

They just want to  destroy our dear planet Earth.

You must stop the apocalypse, I mean UFOcalpyse...

Play in browser, howerer you can download game for the best experience.

CONTROLS:

Move - Arrow keys 

Shoot - CTRL (PC)/ (Mac ENTER) - AUTOFIRE hold button

Controller supported
